thread.title: Two Dera Sacha Sauda member gunned down in Punjab, act caught on CCTV camera
thread.title_full: Two Dera Sacha Sauda member gunned down in Punjab, act caught on CCTV camera

author: FE Online
title: Two Dera Sacha Sauda member gunned down in Punjab, act caught on CCTV camera
text:
Two Dera Sacha Sauda member gunned down in Punjab, act caught on CCTV camera Two Dera Sacha Sauda member gunned down in Punjab, act caught on CCTV camera In a brutal event at Punjab's Khanna two Dera two Dera Sacha Sauda members were gunned down by unidentified assailants on Saturday. By: FE Online  59 AM Two Dera Sacha Sauda memebers were shot dead at Punjab’s Khanna. (Source: Babushahi.com) 
In a brutal event at Punjab’s Khanna two Dera two Dera Sacha Sauda members were gunned down by unidentified assailants on Saturday. The gunmen reportedly came on a motorcycle and killed a man and his son who were the members of Sirsa-headquartered Dera Sacha Sauda. The heartless act was caught on the CCTV camera but the assailants had their faces covered with a handkerchief which made it difficult to identify them. 
Here is the CCTV footage of the incident: Caught on CCTV: Two Dera Sacha Sauda members gunned down by unidentified assailants in Punjab’s Khanna (25.2.2017). pic.twitter.com/y6nxF26zLy
